channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: ‘Tremendous time' to start a blockchain company, says Pantera General Partner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Paul Veradittakit of Pantera Capital believes now could be a good time for new entrepreneurs to enter the crypto space.

item.title: SEC's 'one-dimensional' approach is slowing Bitcoin progress: Grayscale CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Grayscale’s chief was the latest to take a swing at the authority for its so-called “regulation by enforcement” actions.

item.title: North Korea's Lazarus Group masterminded $100M Harmony hack: FBI confirms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The FBI also confirmed earlier reports this month by figures such as ZachXBT that the hackers had started moving a large chunk of the funds around via privacy protocols.

item.title: Stablecoin data points to ‘healthy appetite’ from bulls and possible Bitcoin rally to $25K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin price continues to press higher this week as demand for stablecoins and a key BTC price metric suggests bulls have a “healthy appetite.”

item.title: Ethereum devs create ‘shadow fork’ to test conditions for Ether withdrawals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Developers are attempting to attack the forked testnet with malicious nodes to see if they can find vulnerabilities.

item.title: When meme? Top crypto memes and their meaning
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Memes have become an important, if somewhat humorous, part of the cryptocurrency community.

item.title: Crypto tracker picks up trail of funds heisted from Harmony Bridge in June
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The crypto detectives traced funds stolen by North Korean Lazarus Group through two mixers and various networks to identify 350 addresses where the funds remain today.

item.title: BlockFi exec argues bankruptcy court should approve bonuses to retain talent
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Megan Crowell, losing certain employees could “severely [limit] the debtors’ options“ amid bankruptcy proceedings.

item.title: Bitcoin miners’ worst days may have passed, but a few key hurdles remain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: A handful of improving metrics show profit margins slowly improving for Bitcoin miners, but key areas of the sector remain under pressure.

item.title: Price analysis 1/23: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The rally in stocks could be giving Bitcoin price a boost, and the crypto market could see more fireworks if the Fed confirms investors' expectation that rate hikes will slow down.

item.title: Bitcoin B logo lights up Germany's tallest building in Berlin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Berliners could see the Bitcoin B projected onto the Berliner Fernsehturm tower on January 21.

item.title: Bitcoin price stays near $23K as data shows hodlers not selling BTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Seasoned Bitcoin market participants are anything but willing to take profit, even with the BTC price up 40% in January.

item.title: ECB executive board member outlines plans for digital euro to European Parliament
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: ECB board member Fabio Panetta affirms the ECB’s digital euro privacy policy and says the digital currency will never be programmable, but it may have an app.

item.title: NYDFS advises crypto firms not to commingle user and corporate funds in the event of insolvency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “A VCE's customer agreement should make clear the parties’ intentions to enter into a custodial relationship, rather than a debtor-creditor relationship," said the NYDFS.

item.title: Europol reports $19.5M in crypto seized in enforcement action against Bitzlato
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The operation conducted by authorities across Europe and the U.S. resulted in the arrest of 5 individuals linked to the exchange, including Bitzlato founder Anatoly Legkodymov.

item.title: 3 signs Axie Infinity price risks giving up its 135% gains in January
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: AXS price has formed a "gravestone" doji on its daily chart that coupled with its recent token unlock event hint at a potential bearish reversal ahead.

item.title: Japan’s FSA expects to allow certain stablecoins by June 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: There is yet no opportunity to know whether US dollar-backed stablecoins like USDT or USDC will be allowed in Japan by June 2023, the FSA said.

item.title: Bitcoin miner Argo regains compliance with Nasdaq minimum bid price rule
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Bitcoin mining firm Argo regained compliance with Nasdaq's listing rule, which requires a company to maintain its common stock's minimum bid price of $1 for 30 consecutive trading days.

item.title: Cathie Wood: Ark dumps 500K GBTC shares, adds Coinbase stock as Bitcoin recovers 40%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Ark's GBTC weight in the portfolio actually increased despite the fund selling 500,000 shares in the past month.

item.title: Coinbase CEO urges Bitcoin legal tender for Brazil, Argentina — Reaction
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong tweeted that BTC may be the “right long-term bet” for the two South American countries currently seeking a common currency.

item.title: Enforcement goes on with Bitzlato action: Law Decoded, Jan. 16–23
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Anatoly Legkodymov, founder of China-based crypto firm Bitzlato, was arrested under suspicion of money laundering related to illicit Russian finance.

item.title: 69% users bet metaverse entertainment will reshape social lifestyle: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A new survey from CoinWire revealed that the majority of users believe the metaverse will reshape their social life and interactions.

item.title: BTC metrics exit capitulation — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin retains higher levels after gaining 40% or more this month, but concerns of a BTC price correction are never far away.

item.title: South Africa adds new cryptocurrency standards to advertising code
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Cryptocurrency products and services feature in a new clause in South Africa’s code of advertising practice introduced by the Advertising Regulatory Board.

item.title: Token dump following Binance listing raises insider trading suspicions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Coinbase director Conor Grogan speculated it could be either a rogue employee or a trader who might have access to the losing API.

item.title: Cardano recovers from an outage on 50% relay and block-producing nodes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: An anomaly apparently caused around half of Cardano’s nodes to disconnect and restart over the weekend, with the root cause still under investigation.

item.title: Coinbase cut costs and bolstered rep, but profits remain challenged: Analysts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Analysts from Moody’s and JPMorgan hailed the exchange for its strong reputation but said it wouldn’t be enough to solve its profitability woes.

item.title: Bitcoin price surge: Breakthrough or bull trap? Pundits weigh in
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Bitcoin nearly broke its record for the longest streak of daily green price candles this month, but many believe its recent surge could be short-lived.

item.title: Aussie execs refute ‘argument’ to treat crypto as financial products
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Australian Minister for Financial Services said there was a “good argument” to treat crypto as financial products in an interview on Jan. 22.

item.title: Former SEC chief blasts ‘bogus’ catchphrase: ‘Regulation by enforcement’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Lawyer and former SEC official John Reed Stark came out in defense of the SEC’s enforcement efforts in the crypto space.
